dict.acceptation: 得出结论；缔结；推断出；决定；
终了；作出决定或达成协议；

sent.orig: We would blunt the offensive and conclude the war on honorable terms.
sent.trans: 我们将挫败这个攻势，而按体面的条件结束战争。

sent.orig: If professors complain of low incomes, we conclude that they desire higher salaries.
sent.trans: 如果教授们抱怨收入低，我们可以推定其想获得更高的薪水。

sent.orig: The climactic battle to kill the false being within and victoriously conclude the spiritual revolution.
sent.trans: 战争的高潮是消除负面的人性并且成功地完成心灵改革。

sent.orig: It would be possible and pleasant to conclude this column on an upbeat note.
sent.trans: 我可能也乐于以积极的评语来总结这个专栏。

sent.orig: To conclude, even though our target audience is clearly a new product is always a gamble.
sent.trans: 总结来说，即使我们的目标顾客已订得很清楚，但新产品上巿本来就像赌博，没人能有十成的把握。
